Text:
Looks like a great film... 

BUT, there are no English subtitles, so I'll go and try to find some.

Thanks anyway...

You MIGHT want to include that in the information the next time; just a suggestion.

Cheers!

Just to let you know, I just read your INFO file; nicely put together, BTW  : )

BUT...  The film is not in English; it is is French or Flemmish.  So, if you DO happen to find English subtitles, that would be GREAT!!!

THANKS!!!
